title: Person in Manual Wheelchair
description: A person using a manual wheelchair as a mobility aid.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the person in a manual wheelchair emoji is depicted with a dignified and active posture, showcasing a smooth, modern wheelchair design. Apple's signature 3D shading gives the figure and the chair a realistic depth and subtle gloss, emphasizing inclusivity and independence. The rounded edges and soft lighting contribute to a feeling of accessibility and forward momentum, commonly used to represent disability, accessibility, or personal journeys.
